notes: This playbill does not advertise a play or set of plays, but a single performer's comedic act of songs and recitations.
Mr. Mathews' performance is split into three parts, each containing a number of songs and comic recitations. See playbill for exact details.

performances.title: Budget of Budgets, or The Union of the Rose, Shamrock, and Thistle

ticketing.toBeHad: G. Strettong, Printer; Mr. Mathews, at the Black Moor's Head Inn
